TopicTitle: End User License Agreements Update - New opt out period

Articles.Content:
In a previous post, we mentioned that the Kerbal Space Program End User License Agreement would be receiving an update on March 15th, 2019. This update was delayed and will go live on March 27th, 2019. Please note the 30-day opt out period will now begin on March 27th. Please see the original post for further details.

Thank you!
